casebody.data:
AUSTIN
v.
CONTINENTAL GENERAL TIRE. No. 73P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 25, 2007. Matthew D. Glidewell, Charlotte, for Continental General Tire. Mona Lisa Wallace, Salisbury, Cathy Williams, Ed Pauley, for Austin. Prior report: 141 N.C.App. 397 , 540 S.E.2d 824 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of September 2007."

HUDSON and EDMUNDS, JJ., recused.
